basics.name: Kalki Rose
basics.label: Cloud and Data Expert | Technical Account Lead | Supervisor

work.name: Futurice
work.position: Cloud and Data Platforms Expertise Lead
work.summary:
As part of the leadership team focused on emerging technologies and new market potential, my role was in the lead position of the Cloud and Data Platforms pillar. The outcomes of this initiative was to allocate strategic investment for new products and services, internal training, development of go-to-market solutions, and inform recruitment strategy. As part of this I co-developed the internal Cloud and Data certification program and the Cloud and Data playbook. 

In addition to these core goals, Futurice also went through a restructuring/re-organisation. I was part of the leadership team that developed and implemented the new org structure, going from a matrix like structure, to something taking inspiration from Holacracy.  

 Key Responsibilities

work.name: Futurice
work.summary:
AWS Well Architected cloud architect with professional level certifications in Architecture, DevOps, and Data Analytics

Requirements gathering, proposal writing, and developing architectures integrating with on-premise, cloud and hybrid cloud environments for multi million euro projects.

Architected a solution to integrate a system of 20 data sources across 5 departments using on premise, cloud and streaming data sources.

Mentoring and coaching internal and external technologists. Balancing security, costs optimization, operational excellence, reliability, and performance efficiency.

work.name: Futurice
work.summary:
Supervisor for 6 people and mentor for three people. Coach internally and externally.

Career path development, career path review and salary recommendations using a servant leadership approach.

Build strong, open and trusting relationships.

Facilitate mentoring, expertise coaching.

Career development, learning and performance. Short term and long term goal and expectation discovery.

Fostering an environment that encourages learning.

Well-being with early caring, stress management and work safety.

work.name: Futurice
work.summary: Technical account lead for up to 6 cross functional teams and up to 30 people with a focus on AWS Cloud Architecture and data engineering. Focus on Digitisation, Cloud Migration and Adoption, and Innovation. This role encompassed both the creation and deplyment of cloud solutions, and fostering an environment to enable cultural change within an established automotive company

work.name: Onetest
work.summary:
Revelian is a company that provides a suite of tools across the board for HR, talent acquisition, talent management, psychometrics, and communications analyses.

During my time at Revelian I was involved in two major projects, rebuilding the legacy system and implementing a new video interviewing service. 

The legacy Revelian system was thirteen years old and built in cold fusion. I was involved in architecting and rebuilding this system to fit with current technologies. Our implementation took inspiration from the Netflix API, modeling our new system as a set of microsystems.

We implemented a set of facades over these systems to expose specific functionality to specific consumers for both simplicity and security. The facade to service layers where implemented in as close to pure REST where possible, and the facade to external layers was endpoint specific. 

By implementing an API in this manner we were able to both make the system future proof, as well as enabling the legacy system to integrate with the new system without crippling the new system. 

In addition to the architecture migration, I was also lead on the creation of a new service to provide video interviewing to our clients. The application was developed to integrate seamlessly with the legacy platform while being built with the new architecture. It allows Revelian’s clients to set up one way video interviews for prospective employees, have multiple people review and rate each response, and make hire recommendations, which produced reports and had a rating system which fed back into the existing system for integration into the full suite of Revelian products and hiring process.

The system architecture is built with Java for the micro services and facades, and NodeJS and AngularJS serving the front end UI's. The infrastructure is all AWS, from S3 buckets for content storage, private zones, route53, cloud formation for deployment, security groups, load balancing etc.

work.name: JuniorCru
work.summary:
Working at CruDigital, which then became JuniorCru, kick-started my career into world class development. Using bleeding edge technologies, working with a world class design team, and managed by Matthew Daniels, one of the best technical directors I have had the pleasure of working with, we produced work that I am truly proud of. 

Initially starting as a full stack developer, I was quickly promoted to the role of technical lead, and held this position for the remainder of my tenure. I was involved in the full software life-cycle, from initial meetings with clients through to deployment and maintenance.

In addition to my duties as a developer, as technical lead I was involved in system architecture, researching new technologies, project management, overseeing the team of developers working on my projects, and close relations with accounts services, designers, clients, and management. 


Projects

Careers Australia:                     Technical Lead, Lead Developer
Virgin Australia:                        Technical Lead, Developer
Our Village Foundation:             Technical Lead, Lead Developer
Corporate Real-estate Australia: Technical Lead, Developer

work.name: Cru Digital

work.name: Kintek Web Devlopment
work.summary:
Achievements and Duties

-	Full involvement in all aspects of the software development life-cycle. 

-	Worked within a dynamic team to produce high quality bespoke responsive ecommerce and brochure-ware websites, along with custom built web applications, Facebook competitions and iOS applications for iPhone and iPad. 

-	Project specification and scoping documentation, project management, client relationship building, development in all parts of the project, domain registration, host transfers, launching, quality control, and maintenance. 

-	Acting project manager for two months while the project manager was on leave.  Ran several large projects and maintained a number of ongoing projects. Scheduling, quality control and customer relations, invoicing. 

-	Achieved “Best in Class” award for the 2012 Australian Mobile Awards for work on the Streaka iPad video platform.

volunteer.summary:
Unusual Pioneers is a pioneering platform for corporate leaders and social intrapreneurs turning business into a force for good. We support the work of social intrapreneurs through mentoring, peer-to-peer support, and involvement of executives across industries. 

Learn more on unusualpioneers.com

references.name: 👩‍💻 Leilei Ouyang 🐘
references.reference:
Kalki has been an encouraging, inspiring and empathetic supervisor during my time at Futurice. He encourages me to learn and experiment with different technologies, inspires me to expand my skill set and take on new challenges, and provides me valuable guidance on career progression. 

Kalki possesses a humble and participative leadership style through active listening, comprehensive analysis, constructive escalation and productive problem-solving which make him an empathetic leader as well as an outstanding team player.
